pr_title: [BEAM-9821] Populate all SpannerIO batching parameters in display data.

timeline.bodyText:
I added some commits to tweak these descriptions a bit. @nielm can you confirm that they're still correct?
Also I wonder if you can re-use the implementation in Write by calling spec.populateDisplayData(builder) here instead?
timeline.author: TheNeuralBit

replies.bodyText:
LGTM.
I extracted a single method in Write to populate the displayData with parameters to avoid repeating code.
replies.author: nielm
